name: Score Grid
description:
Score Grid lets you easily keep track of game scores using your device. It's designed to be simple and quick: add players and then start scoring! The app will create rounds as you need them, or you can create different categories for games with scoring rules like 7 Wonders or Agricola. There are built in templates for many popular games, and you can create and save your own templates for games you play a lot. Scoring entry is done using a calculator-like panel, so you can enter numbers directly or do basic calculations to help add up totals.

There are no in-app purchases.

Features:
Calculator panel for easy input and calculation of points
Navigate score grid without leaving the calculator - makes scoring on phones simple!
Templates for many popular board games
Create and save your own templates
Tracks winner and loser (high or low scoring)
